h3.a: Howells-Dodge FCCLA Members Are State Award Winners

div.p:
Nebraska FCCLA has announced the winners of individual and chapter state awards for 2020. Due to the Coronavirus, the State FCCLA Leadership Conference, which was to be held April 5 – 7, was cancelled. This year, the on-line scores from the district STAR competitions were used to formulate the scores to determine the individual state award winners.
. . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Howells-Dodge FCCLA Members Are State Award Winners

div.p: The Howells-Dodge Yearbook Staff is asking students, staff, and parents to share photos of what you are doing during the COVID-19 school closing. We would love to get some pictures of students doing school enrichment activities, working out, helping out at home, or examples of any other things you are doing during the pandemic. Photos can be emailed to mprusa@hdcjags.org and will be shared with the yearbook staff.

a.aria-label: Read more about Share Your Photos!
